channel.title: Norwegian foundation day.
channel.description:
Today (the 17th of May) is basically like 4th of July to Americans.
Except instead of shooting fireworks at the sky at night, every single children school creates a giant "train" of people with a Corps (which I hope google translate isn't joking with me to translate) behind them, gathering people more people as they go. Everyone is singing, blowing in annoying plastic whistles and yelling "Hurra!" and "Gratulerer med dagen". This happens from 7am to about 11 - 12am.
After that they meet and eat hot dogs and ice cream. After a successful attempt on waking everyone up early in the morning on a holiday.
Discuss this "magnificent" day if you care.

danielsangeo:

A MØØSE ONCE BIT MY SISTER

DU KØDDER IKKE MED ELG

Edit: Google Translate will mess that shit up real bad, do not listen to it.

item.description:
The two posts above was what woke me up at 8am on a holiday (when I usually wake up about 11am-1pm)

item.title: Norwegian foundation day.
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
hipp hipp hurra!

that is a cheer we use to say on May 17th

And I’m not too late. It is 23.29 now

item.title: Norwegian foundation day.
item.dc:creator: BerZerK
item.description:
Idi:

do you have weird racist elves or is that just christmas and probably a different country

To my knowledge that would be a different country. But one should always be on a lookout for racist elves.

Oh, and grats to us.
